title: DIGITAL SOCIAL NETWORK ANALYSIS - Lecturer: Fabio Giglietto - A.Y. 2024/2025 - Credits 6 - UniUrb
snippet: This is a course syllabus for 'Digital Social Network Analysis' taught by Fabio Giglietto at the University of Urbino Carlo Bo for the academic year 2024/2025. It outlines the course's objectives, content, and the skills students will acquire, including analyzing digital media, collecting data from the web and social media, and using R and Gephi for analysis.  The document was updated on Feb 15, 2025.
description: The content is a course syllabus for 'Digital Social Network Analysis' taught by Fabio Giglietto at the University of Urbino Carlo Bo, outlining the course's objectives, content, and skills students will acquire. It focuses on digital media analysis, data collection from web and social media, and using R and Gephi for analysis.

title: Mapping Italian News Research Program - UniUrb
snippet: The MINE (Mapping Italian News) Research Program, where Fabio Giglietto is involved, announced the publication of a white paper titled 'The State of Social Media Research APIs & Tools in the Digital Services Act Era.' Co-authored by Fabio Giglietto and Massimo Terenzi, the paper explores how the Digital Services Act (DSA) is transforming data access for platform research.
description: The MINE Research Program at UniUrb announced a white paper co-authored by Fabio Giglietto and Massimo Terenzi, exploring the impact of the Digital Services Act (DSA) on data access for platform research.
